longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for the period of intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for Nationals of Armenia.
Additional Information:
- Normal non-biometric passports issued to nationals of
  Armenia must contain an endorsement stating the validity of
  the passport for stays abroad.
- Visitors with stays longer than three days must
  
Warning:
- Nationals of Armenia not holding return/onward tickets could
  be refused entry
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly to P. Vivax, is
  low and exists from June to October in some villages located
  in parts of the country bordering Afghanistan, Kyrgyzstan
  and Tajikistan. Recommended prevention in risk areas: A.
